item.title: Disneyland One-Day vs Annual Passport Prices Over Time: 1981 to 2019 (adjusted for 2020 dollars)
item.description: Line chart showing Disneyland one-day ticket price vs annual passport price (1981-2019, adjusted for inflation), showing linear growth for one-day ticket prices and exponential growth for annual passport prices. (see notes below for data sources and more info) The Gool Old Days My sister and I were lucky enough to have Disneyland annual passports growing up (thank you, mom and dad!). I remember the prices being super low in general, like in the $20 range with a Southern California discount for single tickets, and I thought maybe my memory was deceiving me until I looked up the historical prices.
